intro_para.intent: I am writing to express my interest in the mechanical engineering fall internship position, which I found through Northeastern's Co-op network.
intro_para.reason: I am approaching my fourth year as a BS/MS candidate for Mechanical Engineering and am eager to gain more experience before graduation.
intro_para.proposition: I believe my previous experience and strong interest in the automation industry make me an ideal candidate for this role.

para_background.experience: During my time at Portal Instruments, also a startup in the area, I worked on a complex electromechanical assembly.
This project involved a lot of design, fabrication, and testing, which I believe is not unlike the work I would be doing at Piaggio.
At my last co-op at Bio-Rad, I worked mostly independently on a piece of automation equipment, which involved the integration of mechanical, electrical, and software concepts.
I am currently studying to have a concnetration in Mechatronics and am strongly interested in all things automation and interdisciplinary.
In addition to my work experience, I also participate in AIAA, where I have begun to help with the mechanical design of an RC plane as well as the implementation of several sensors.
